options.smoothgamemodeswitcher.title: Smooth Gamemode Switcher
options.smoothgamemodeswitcher.disablefl: Disables flying mode when switching to creative at smaller or equaled height over block below(Block height is part of the calculation)
options.smoothgamemodeswitcher.gamemodeO:
Add the gamemode numbers to change the order you will switch gamemodes to.

0: Survival
1: Creative
2: Adventure
3: Spectator

Only integer values are allowed.
If you add more than 4 gamemodes, they will be removed.
Â§lDUPLICATES ARE NOT ALLOWED!
